value.title: Azure fundamentals learning path
value.excerpt: Follow this learning path for a broad and compelling introduction to the fundamentals of Azure cloud computing.

topItems.title: Cloud Concepts - Principles of cloud computing
topItems.excerpt: Explore the core concepts of cloud computing and how it can help your business.

images.title: Cloud Concepts - Principles of cloud computing

topItems.title: Create an Azure account
topItems.excerpt: The first step to using Azure is to sign up. You may sign up directly through Azure.com, with the help of a Microsoft representative, or through a partner. If you’re new to Azure, you may sign up for an Azure free account to start exploring with $200 USD free credit and free services.

images.title: Create an Azure account

topItems.title: Core Cloud Services - Introduction to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Get started with Azure by creating and configuring your first website in the cloud.

images.title: Core Cloud Services - Introduction to Azure

topItems.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure architecture and service guarantees
topItems.excerpt: Azure provides a global network of secure datacenters you can deploy your services into. Learn about the physical architecture of Azure, how redundancy is provided, and what service guarantees Microsoft provides.

images.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure architecture and service guarantees
Cloud Concepts - Principles of cloud computing

value.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure architecture and service guarantees
value.excerpt: Azure provides a global network of secure datacenters you can deploy your services into. Learn about the physical architecture of Azure, how redundancy is provided, and what service guarantees Microsoft provides.

images.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure architecture and service guarantees

value.title: Deploy and run a containerized web app with Azure App Service
value.excerpt: Create a Docker image and store it in a repository in Azure Container Registry. Use Azure App Service to deploy a web application based on the Docker image. Configure continuous deployment for the web app by using a webhook that monitors the Docker image for changes.

images.title: Deploy and run a containerized web app with Azure App Service

value.title: Describe SQL Server query plans
value.excerpt: Read and understand various forms of execution plans. Compare estimated vs actual plans. Learn how and why plans are generated.

value.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure networking options
value.excerpt: Running your app or service in the cloud requires a fast and secure network. Learn some of the Azure networking basics and how Azure networking helps improve resiliency and reduce latency.

value.excerpt: Tour the Azure portal features and services, and customize your portal.

value.excerpt: Learn about governance and management in Azure services.

images.title: Apply and monitor infrastructure standards with Azure Policy

value.title: Predict costs and optimize spending for Azure
value.excerpt: Cost is one of the most important aspects of the cloud and can have a massive impact on your business. Azure has several tools available to help you get a better understanding of cloud spend and some best practices that you can leverage to help you save money.

images.title: Predict costs and optimize spending for Azure

value.title: AZ-104: Prerequisites for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: If you're an IT Administrator that's new to Azure and need to prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator, this path is the place to start. Learn the basic Azure concepts you'll need to know as an Azure administrator.

value.title: Secure your cloud data in Azure learning path
value.excerpt: This learning path helps you leverage the built-in Azure services for securing app data, ensuring that only authorized services and clients have access.

topItems.title: Security, responsibility, and trust in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Discuss the basic concepts for protecting your infrastructure and data when you work in the cloud. Understand what responsibilities are yours and what Azure takes care of for you.

images.title: Security, responsibility, and trust in Azure

topItems.title: Top 5 security items to consider before pushing to production
topItems.excerpt: Secure your web applications on Azure and protect your apps against the most common and dangerous web application attacks.

images.title: Top 5 security items to consider before pushing to production

topItems.title: Configure security policies to manage data
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to set up policies to classify, retain, and protect your cloud-based data.

images.title: Configure security policies to manage data

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data. Find out how to use access keys, to secure networks, and to use Advanced Threat Protection to proactively monitor your system.

images.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
Security, responsibility, and trust in Azure

value.title: Secure your cloud data

value.title: Store data in Azure learning path
value.excerpt: This learning path gets you started with the basics of storage management in Azure, Storage Account creation, and choices for data storage.

topItems.title: Choose a data storage approach in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how using Azure Storage, Azure SQL Database, and Azure Cosmos DB - or a combination of them - for your business scenario is the best way to get the most performant solution.

images.title: Choose a data storage approach in Azure

topItems.title: Create an Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Create an Azure Storage account with the correct options for your business needs.

images.title: Create an Azure Storage account

topItems.excerpt: Create a simple application and add configuration, client library references, and code to connect it to Azure Storage.

value.title: Store data in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure provides a variety of ways to store data: unstructured, archival, relational, and more. Learn the basics of storage management in Azure, how to create a Storage Account, and how to choose the right model for the data you want to store in the cloud.

topItems.title: Choose a data storage approach in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how using Azure Storage, Azure SQL Database, and Azure Cosmos DB - or a combination of them - for your business scenario is the best way to get the most performant solution.

value.title: Architect network infrastructure in Azure learning path
value.excerpt: Learn how to architect a secure, flexible, network infrastructure in Azure and connect on-premises networks to your Azure resources.

topItems.title: Connect your on-premises network to Azure with VPN Gateway
topItems.excerpt: VPN Gateway in Azure provides secure connectivity between your on-premises networks and clients.

images.title: Connect your on-premises network to Azure with VPN Gateway

topItems.title: Connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft global network by using ExpressRoute
topItems.excerpt: Connect your on-premises systems and users to Azure and Office 365 by using ExpressRoute for private, dedicated, and guaranteed throughput connectivity.

images.title: Connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft global network by using ExpressRoute

topItems.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints
topItems.excerpt: Network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

images.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints

topItems.title: Distribute your services across Azure virtual networks and integrate them by using virtual network peering
topItems.excerpt: Use virtual network peering to enable communication across virtual networks in a way that's secure and minimally complex.

images.title: Distribute your services across Azure virtual networks and integrate them by using virtual network peering
Connect your on-premises network to Azure with VPN Gateway

value.title: Architect network infrastructure in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to architect a secure, flexible, network infrastructure in Azure and connect on-premises networks to your Azure resources.

topItems.excerpt: Use virtual network peering to enable communication across virtual networks in a way that's secure and minimally complex.

value.title: Administer infrastructure resources in Azure learning path
value.excerpt: This learning path teaches how to create and customize Windows and Linux virtual machines, connect them to virtual networks, and keep them updated.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the decisions you make before creating a virtual machine, the options to create and manage the VM, and the extensions and services you use to manage your VM.

images.title: Introduction to Azure virtual machines

topItems.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we discuss how to create a Linux virtual machine using the Azure portal.

images.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure

topItems.title: Create a Windows virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Azure virtual machines (VMs) enable you to create dedicated compute resources in minutes that can be used just like a physical desktop or server machine.

images.title: Create a Windows virtual machine in Azure

topItems.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

images.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
Introduction to Azure virtual machines
